column1: short of length outside off, opens the face to run it down to third man
fuller around off, pushes it towards mid-on
length ball, coming in after landing, pushed towards cover-point for one
back of length around off, dabbed towards short third man for one
fuller outside off, in the corridor, looks to drive and gets beaten
length outside off, goes for the cut but misses
fuller, angling on the pads, pushes it just to the right of the bowler, a single as mid-off cuts it off
fuller around off, driven towards the bowler, who makes a stop in his followthrough
fuller on the stumps, smashes it hard but straight towards mid-off, scampers across for a quick single
fuller around off, looks to go aerial down the ground, fails to connect
fuller on the stumps, lofts it over the bowler's head for the first over of the match
length on middle, lobs it towards mid-on, well short of the fielder
fuller around off, looks to go over extra cover, ends up slicing it over cover-point, four more to the total
fuller and swigging in, beats the bat to hit the batsman on the pads, an appeal for lbw but the impact was outside off
short of length this time, a snorter, pushes the batsman back, who removes his bottom hand and defends in front of his face
fuller on the stumps, flicked away towards midwicket for three
fuller and swinging in again, driven through midwicket once again, the deep square leg fielder didn't have any chance to stop it
short of length outside off, goes for the pull, doesn't time it well enough, will get a single to deep square leg
fuller outside off, smashes it on the front foot but straight to mid-off
length on middle and leg, flicked away past short fine leg for four
length outside off, guides it towards third man
fuller outside off, drives but straight to cover
length outside off, looks to hit it on the up, through the covers, gets beaten by the bounce
length outside off, skips down the track and smashes it past extra cover for four
length ball, on the pads, pulls it fine, beating the man at short fine leg, the umpire thinks it just brushed the pads
down the track to this length ball and smashes it towards midwicket boundary
straying on the pads once again, flicked away past short fine leg for another boundary
back of length on middle and leg, drops it towards square leg for a quick single
back of length outside off, pushed towards cover-point
fuller and wider and crashed past the diving backward point on his right
fuller around off, comes down the track and miscues the lofted shot towards mid-off, Maxwell moves a little back and to his left and takes it comfortably
short of length outside off, dabs it towards backward point
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
back of length outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it down the third man
length outside off, coming in with the angle, left alone
short of length around off, jags back in after landing, Turner was looking to run it down, gets an inside edge to short fine leg
length outside off, moving away off the seam, Turner pushes at it and gets beaten
fuller around off, down the track, gives himself some room and smashes it between the bowler and the mid-off
length on middle and leg, flicked towards square leg
fuller on middle and leg, flicks it straight towards square leg
a sharp bouncer on middle, goes for the pull but cannot connect
length around off, pushed towards covers for a quick single
short of length on the stumps, pushes it towards square leg and sets off, a direct hit and Turner was gone
a short one but it sails over the batsman's head, called a wide
slower one outside off, Turner picks it up and dispatches it over midwicket
length on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
fuller outside off, drives it towards sweeper cover
back of length, in the rib cage, drops it towards square leg for one
a slow dipping full toss on the pads, flicks it towards deep backward square leg
starts with a back of length delivery, just outside off, Turner moves across and works it towards short midwicket
fuller on leg, moves away and flicks it towards deep square leg
slower one on the pads, flicked away towards the left of fine leg
short of length on middle and leg, pulled towards fine leg for one more
length on the pads, moves across and flicks it towards fine leg
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg, sprints back for the second
short of length on middle and leg, skips down and cuts it towards point
length around off, gets on the toes and turns it towards square leg
fuller around off, skips down and hoicks across, ends up dragging it towards deep midwicket, sprints back for the second
length around off, goes deep, almost behind the stumps on the off side and works it towards short midwicket
fuller outside off, drives it firmly towards sweeper cover
back of length outside off, steered towards third man
fuller outside off, looks to dig it out towards cover, misses
googly, length around off, pushed towards short midwicket off the back foot for a quick single
fuller around off, flicked towards deep midwicket
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
fuller outside off, looks to smash it straight, ends up inside edging on to the pads
fuller again, looks to drive it on the off side, gets an inside edge to short fine leg
length around off, looks to go down the ground but ends up slicing it towards deep extra cover where Maddinson takes a simple catch
length outside off, pushes it towards backward point from the back foot
length outside off, stays back and forces it towards deep point
length outside off, pushed towards cover-point off the back foot
fuller around off, in the slot and lofted over mid-off for four
pitched up again, comes forward and drives it straight towards mid-off
fuller around middle, drives it towards long-on
fuller and wider outside off, drives it towards deep extra cover for a couple
a low full toss on the stumps, pushed towards midwicket
back of length on the stumps, goes back and punches it towards sweeper cover
length around off, pushes at it, gets an inside edge on to the pads, collects a single as the ball rolls towards square leg
fuller around off, smashed back at the bowler who fumbles and gives away a single
slower length ball around off, smashed towards the bowler who gets a hand to the ball on its way towards long-off
back of length outside off, pushes it towards covers for a quick single
slower length ball, pulls it towards deep midwicket for four
a yorker on leg stump from around the wicket, digs it out towards square leg
short of length and pulled away towards deep square, a sliding stop keeps it to two
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on
short of length outside off, cuts it towards extra cover
fuller from Zampa, Bancroft skips down, reaches to the pitch of the ball and smashes it over deep midwicket
length around off, flatter this time, gets an inside edge on to the pads, collects two as the ball rolls towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, driven towards mid-on
fuller on the stumps and smashed over the bowler's head for a four
length around off, pushes it towards long-on for two
length outside off, defends off the back foot towards extra cover
slower short ball, pulled towards deep backward square leg
fuller on the stumps and launched over midwicket
short of length and backs away to pull it, ends up hitting it straight to Maxwell who not only drops it but lets it go for the boundary
backs away and smashes this back of length ball over deep midwicket
short of length outside off, hits it over mid-off for four
deft touch, back of length outside off, shuffles in the crease, gives some room and cuts it over the short third man
slower one on middle and leg, moves across but ends up lobbing it on the leg side
length ball on the stumps, backs away and looks to smash it hard down the ground, misses
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards long-on with soft hands for a couple
fuller on the stumps and goes straight, extension of the arms it sails just over long-on
slower one, short of length, pulled towards deep midwicket, the fielder there flicks it towards incoming deep square leg but the direction is not right, which results in an extra run
a low full toss around off, stays back and hits it towards long-on
fuller again, chipped towards long-off this time
fuller around off, smashes it towards long-off for one
short of length on the leg stump, backs away and cuts it towards deep backward point
short of length, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
fuller on the stumps, gives himself some room and launches it over long-on for a big six
length ball, looked like a slider, Turner goes for the big shot  but the ball hits high up on the bat and Maxwell takes a well-judged catch near the boundary line
short of length, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket, not the best of the timings but that allows the second run
short of length outside off, cuts it towards extra cover, a bit of fumble there but only a single
fuller on the leg stump, driven towards long-on
almost a yorker, dipping at the batsman, Mitchell Marsh gets bottom edge on to, and the ball races past the keeper, just beating the fine leg
fuller on the stumps, hits it towards long-off, along the ground
fuller on the stumps, digs it out towards long-on
a low full toss on the stumps, smashed towards long-on for a couple
a full toss on the pads, looks to hit it on the leg side, misses and is hit on the pads, the ball rolls towards off side
length around off, pushes at it, gets an inside edge towards fine leg
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards mid-on
a touch further up and a lofted drive over the bowler's head for four
back of length outside off, left alone
fuller on the stumps, lofted over mid-on who runs back but the ball just evades him, prevents the boundary with a slide though
length outside off, transfers the wright back and cuts it, but straight towards cover
fuller around off, looks to hit hard, the ball hits the inner half and rolls towards mid-off
short of length outside off, goes for the pull but is hurried on, mistimed towards mid-on

short of length, pulled away and hits it straight towards the square leg, the fielder perhaps is saying it didn't carry, but the umpires are checking upstairs. Soft signal is out, but the batsmen are not happy with it. Hobson is the fielder. It's very close, the third umpire is taking his time, and he deems it carried to the fielder. Ben Dunk cannot believe that
fuller around off, looks for the drive and misses
back of length outside off, runs it down towards third man
short of length outside off, goes back and pulls it towards the left of the mid-on, a good tumbling stop there
length, angling across the batsman who comes forward and looks to drive it towards covers, the ball hits the inner part and rolls towards short midwicket
length around off, angling across once again, Handscomb pushes at it and gets beaten
length around off, drops it towards point but no run as the fielder is quick to the ball
length around off and middle, looks to push it on the off side, the bat turns at the point of impact and the ball goes towards short midwicket
length around off, guided towards third man for one
length around off, cramping for the room, chopped towards mid-off
length around off, no feet movement by Handscomb, pushes at it and gets beaten
that's pressure, length outside off, looks to clear mid-off, ends up slicing it in the air and Marsh moves to his left from mid-off and takes a sliding catch
back of length outside off, gets on his toes and defends it on the off side
fuller outside off, driven through covers, the fielder chases it but cannot prevent three
length around off, some extra bounce there surprises the batsman who pulls out of the cut at the last moment
back of length outside off, punched past the backward point for four
back of length on the stumps, gets an inside edge on to the body
back of length outside off, steered towards backward point
back of length outside off, goes for the cut and misses
back of length around off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover for a quick single
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards mid-off
back of length, at the batsman who drops it towards covers and sets off for a quick single
length but straying down the leg side, a wide
short of length, just takes his back foot out and pulls it towards deep midwicket, bounces just inside
fuller but once again down the leg side
length outside off, looks to drive on the up, the bottom hand comes off as a thick outside edge dribbles towards third man
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards backward square leg
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg
length, way outside off, goes for an airy shot but doesn't connect
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg
fuller on middle and leg, flicked towards short midwicket for a quick single, a direct hit at the bowler's end would have been interesting
length ball on the pads, tapped towards midwicket for one
fuller on the stumps, driven towards mid-on
length around off, comes forward and punches it towards the bowler who cannot intercept but mid-off cuts it off
back of length outside off, slashes it past backward point for four
back of length on the body, Stoinis can only push it down the wicket
length but down the leg side, Maxwell swivels to pull it fine and clears the fine leg easily
fuller around off and smashed right back at the bowler. Tye outstretches his left hand but it doesn't stick
length on middle and leg, flicked towards fine leg
length on middle and leg, glanced towards fine leg
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on, a fumble there but only one run
short and wide and cuts it away, the sweeper cover dives to his left, gets a hand to it but cannot stop it completely and watches the ball goes touch the boundary rope
length on middle and leg, flicked towards backward square leg
length around off and smashed over mid-off for four
back of length on middle and leg, punched towards long-on from the back foot
fuller on the stumps, looks to pick it away towards square leg, misses and is struck on the pads, an appeal for lbw but that was heading down
a good yorker, tries to squeeze it out, gets an inside edge towards fine leg
short of length, goes for the pull, gets a glove on it and it races towards the fine leg boundary
a high full toss outside off, surprises Maxwell, called a no-ball for height
almost a yorker around off, Maxwell digs it out towards long-on for two
fuller on the pads, glanced towards fine leg
fuller, almost a yorker outside off, digs it out towards mid-off
short of length on the leg stump and Maxwell has once again pulled it fine, over the fielder at fine leg, for a six
fuller around off, uses his wrists to flick it towards wide long-on
another full delivery, and another wristy flick but this time straight towards long-on
short of length around off, goes back and hits it towards extra cover
a yorker on the off stump, Stoinis digs it out back towards the bowler
fuller outside off this time and Stoinis lofts it over extra cover, and gets a boundary
length ball on leg stumps, tucked away towards fine leg
fuller on the stumps and lofted towards wide long-on. The fielder cannot cut it off
length ball on middle and leg, cramping the batsman who works it towards square leg, the fielder is at the boundary which allows a second run
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg
fuller and wider, steered towards deep point for two more
back of length around off, gets on his toes and works it towards long-on
length on middle and leg, pushed towards midwicket
length ball on the pads, whipped behind square on the leg side
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on
short of length, on the pads, whipped again towards deep square leg
length outside off, Maxwell hits it over wide long-on, gets to his fifty with that six
short again, goes deep and pulls it between deep square leg and deep midwicket for four
length outside off, cuts it towards backward point
fuller, almost in the blockhole, squeezes it out towards square leg
back of length outside off, looks to smash it towards midwicket, misses
fuller outside off, steered towards third man
short of length at the batsman, mistimes the pull towards long-on
a high full toss on middle stumps, lofted wide of long-on, a couple of bounces and over the rope
length on middle, works it towards deep midwicket for one
backs away but it's length outside off, looks to cut but cannot get bat on it
length around off, looks to go for that fine pull, misses and is hit on the arm
fuller outside off, steers it towards sweeper cover
short of length around off, pushed towards long-on
fuller on the pads, looks to flick it away fine but ends up skying it towards fine leg, Hobson sprints from deep backward square leg, and takes a tumbling catch with fingers pointed upwards
fuller outside off, throws his hands at it, gets an outside edge towards third man
fuller outside off, smashes but fails to keep it down, Turner takes a good low catch at extra cover
fuller around off, opens the face to run it towards third man
length ball on middle, looks to push it down the wicket, gets an inside edge on to the pads that rolls towards square leg
length outside off, steered towards third man by Bravo once more
fuller outside off, flashes at it, gets one to sweeper cover
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-off
fuller around off, looks go over long-off, doesn't get the timing right, only a single
short of length on middle and leg, pulled over deep backward square leg, into the stands, 103 metres
a wide full toss, fails to put it away and ends up steering it towards backward point
pitched up this time, looks to drag it on the leg side, gets an inside edge on to the shoe
fuller on the off stump, looks to go aerial, bringing his wrists into the play but all he gets is height, short midwicket moves to his left and settles under it to complete the catch
back of length in the rib cage area, tucked away towards fine leg
a low full toss outside off, hits it towards sweeper cover
yorker, on the stumps, Gotch tries to dig it out, gets an inside edge towards fine leg
a low full toss outside off, and driven wide of long-off, the call was for two but the fielder fails to cut it off
down the track and looks to smash it over long-on, ends up mis-hitting it towards extra cover, the ball calls for it and completes the catch
a high full toss around off, hits it towards long-off
a low full toss on the stumps and lofted over the bowler's head, into the sightscreen for a six
was in the slot once again, looks to go over midwicket, gets an inside edge on to the pads
slower one outside off, looks to go over long-on, gets beaten by the lack of pace
third wicket for Coulter-Nile, a low full toss on middle and leg, Plunkett takes on the long-on but does't get the elevation, a nice overhead catch by Tye
length ball on middle and leg and pulled away behind square leg for four
length ball, slower one outside off, Gotch cannot pick it up and ends up dragging it towards deep midwicket
fuller outside off, steers it towards deep point
a full toss around off, goes aerial but cannot get the timing right, Coulter-Nile takes it at long-on, tumbling backwards
another full toss, this time outside off, and hits it towards long-off, Marsh comes in and takes a low catch
goes for the yorker but doesn't get it right, Zampa turns this half-volley towards square leg
a low full toss on the stumps, backs away and dabs it towards covers
fuller outside off, in the blockhole, cannot put bat on the ball
